===Let the world see me===

● Our all new update has many changes and surprises in store for you!
● From now on, we don't just shoot, take selfies, edit and enhance photos; we're a way of life!
● You can use your camera to share your ups and downs and your stories; speak to the world through your lens!
● Here you can share photos, videos and even join challenges along with the other 700 million users worldwide;
● Here you can become a global idol! Featured videos, featured themes, recommended users; they're all waiting for you! 
● You'll see that----"Let the world see me" is something awesome!

It's a sweet edition. We put a lot of love into our Camera360 and bring you an even better experience.

4. Follow us on:
